{"weaviate_collections":[{"name":"HospitalPatients","properties":[{"name":"patientName","data_type":["text"],"description":"Name of the patient."},{"name":"age","data_type":["number"],"description":"Age of the patient."},{"name":"admitted","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the patient is currently admitted to the hospital."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The HospitalPatients collection tracks patient information, including their demographics and admission status. {"weaviate_collections":[{"name":"FitnessCenterMembers","properties":[{"name":"memberName","data_type":["text"],"description":"Name of the fitness center member."},{"name":"membershipDuration","data_type":["number"],"description":"Duration of the membership in months."},{"name":"activeMembership","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the membership is currently active."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The FitnessCenterMembers collection maintains records of all members, tracking their membership duration and active status. {"weaviate_collections":[{"name":"CarRentalVehicles","properties":[{"name":"vehicleModel","data_type":["text"],"description":"Model of the vehicle available for rent."},{"name":"mileage","data_type":["number"],"description":"Mileage of the vehicle."},{"name":"currentlyAvailable","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates whether the vehicle is currently available for renting."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The CarRentalVehicles collection manages the inventory of rental cars, tracking their model, mileage, and availability status, which is essential for informing rental options."},{"name":"RentalCustomers","properties":[{"name":"customerName","data_type":["text"],"description":"Name of the customer renting vehicles."},{"name":"rentalPoints","data_type":["number"],"description":"Accumulated rental loyalty points by the customer."},{"name":"vipStatus","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the customer has VIP status."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The RentalCustomers collection keeps track of customer information, including loyalty points and VIP status, enabling personalized service and incentivizing repeat rentals."},{"name":"RentalBookings","properties":[{"name":"bookingReference","data_type":["text"],"description":"Reference for the rental booking."},{"name":"rentalDurationDays","data_type":["number"],"description":"Duration of the rental in days."},{"name":"confirmed","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the booking is confirmed."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"RentalBookings documents each rental transaction, noting the booking reference, duration, and confirmation status, to streamline booking processes and manage inventory effectively."}]}

{"weaviate_collections":[{"name":"ArtisanMarkets","properties":[{"name":"marketName","data_type":["text"],"description":"Name of the artisan market."},{"name":"vendorCount","data_type":["number"],"description":"Number of vendors participating in the market."},{"name":"currentlyOpen","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates whether the market is currently open."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The ArtisanMarkets collection captures information about various markets, including their name, number of participating vendors, and open status. This helps in organizing events, scheduling openings, and reporting on market sizes."},{"name":"VendorProfiles","properties":[{"name":"vendorName","data_type":["text"],"description":"Name of the vendor participating in markets."},{"name":"productVarieties","data_type":["number"],"description":"Number of different product types that the vendor offers."},{"name":"activeVendor","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the vendor is currently active in the market system."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"VendorProfiles maintain detailed records of each vendor involved in artisan markets, highlighting their offerings and participation status, aiding in vendor management and operational logistics."},{"name":"MarketBookings","properties":[{"name":"bookingReference","data_type":["text"],"description":"Reference ID for the market booking."},{"name":"stallCount","data_type":["number"],"description":"Number of stalls booked by a vendor."},{"name":"paymentConfirmed","data_type":["boolean"],"description":"Indicates if the payment for the booking is confirmed."}],"envisioned_use_case_overview":"The MarketBookings collection tracks all stall bookings within the artisan markets with a focus on organizing vendor participation, managing stall allocations, and ensuring financial transactions are up to date."}]}
